'"Broken"' is the debut single by Australian singer, Sam Clark's debut album,
[[Take Me Home (Sam Clark album)|Take Me Home]]. The song was written and
produced by Paul Wiltshire [http://www.undercover.com.au/News-
Story.aspx?id=10235 News about Sam Clark's single - Broken] Retrieved 6 May
2010 and was released digitally on 13 November 2009
[http://itunes.apple.com/au/album/broken/id338642653?i=338642815 Sam Clark
single- Broken (iTunes Store)] Retrieved 6 May 2010 and physically on 19
November
